scripts.build-test: npx rollup test/entry.js --format umd --file dist/test.umd.js --external jquery,handlebars,underscore --globals jquery:$,handlebars:Handlebard,underscore:_ --config rollup.config.mjs
scripts.build-umd: npx rollup src/bullbone.js --format umd --file dist/bullbone.umd.js --name bullbone --amd.id bullbone --external jquery,handlebars,underscore --globals jquery:$,handlebars:Handlebard,underscore:_ --config rollup.config.mjs
scripts.build-esm: npx rollup src/bullbone.js --format esm --file dist/bullbone.js --external jquery,handlebars,underscore --config rollup.config.mjs
scripts.prepare: npm run build-umd && npm run build-esm
